articles.title: Geologists discover three new minerals in the southwestern U.S. - Earth.com
articles.summary: Geologists discover three new minerals in the southwestern U. S. On a windswept spur of Cookes Peak in Luna County, New Mexico, geologists have logged three minerals never before cataloged by science.
